title: Police Cameras at Pelosiâ€™s House Were Unmonitored as They Caught Break-In
description: Minutes went by before any Capitol Police officer reviewed the footage. Law enforcement leaders said they planned to beef up protections for members of Congress.
media:credit: Shuran Huang for The New York Times
media:description: Many lawmakers say it has long been clear that Capitol security officials must do more to protect them.
